subTitle: All Experts In One Place
greetingLine2: You have arrived at the platform that will connect you directly to clients who are looking exactly for you! Thanks to a user-friendly interface tailored to your needs, you'll be able to enjoy quality referrals in your area.
whyChooseUs: Why is this worth it for you?
whyPoint1: Exposure to clients who need your service
whyPoint2: A digital card ready at the end of registration
whyPoint3: Half a year without extra cost for referrals
whyPoint4: Coming soon! Services for business optimization
footerNote: With zero risk and the opportunity to profit, all you have to do is click the button below
